00019 #ifndef _ICMP_PACKET_H
00020 #define _ICMP_PACKET_H
00021 
00022 #include "inttypes.h"
00023 
00024 class IcmpPacket
00025 {
00026         private:
00027                 // private copy constructor
00028                 IcmpPacket(IcmpPacket& p) {};
00029         public:
00030 
00031                 enum {
00032                         ICMP_TYPE_ECHO_REPLY = 0,
00033                         ICMP_TYPE_ECHO_REQUEST = 8
00034                 };
00043                 IcmpPacket(const unsigned int id, 
00044                                 const unsigned int sequence,
00045                                 const unsigned int size = 32);
00046 
00054                 IcmpPacket(const char* payload, const int size);
00055 
00059                 ~IcmpPacket();
00060 
00066                 const char* rawData() const;
00067 
00073                 const unsigned int getSize() const { return m_size; };
00074 
00080                 const unsigned int getSequenceNumber() const { return ntohs(m_icmp_packet->header.seq); }
00081 
00087                 const unsigned int getType() const { return ntohs(m_icmp_packet->header.type); }
00088                 
00094                 const unsigned int getId() const { return ntohs(m_icmp_packet->header.id); }
00095         private:
00096 
00100                 void fillData();
00101 
00105                 void calculateChecksum();
00106 
00110                 struct icmp_header 
00111                 {
00112                         uint8_t type;
00113                         uint8_t code;
00114                         uint16_t checksum;
00115                         uint16_t id;
00116                         uint16_t seq;
00117                         uint32_t timestamp;
00118                 };
00119 
00124                 struct icmp_packet
00125                 {
00126                         icmp_header header;
00127                         char data;
00128                 };
00129 
00133                 char* m_buffer;
00134 
00138                 unsigned int m_size;
00139 
00144                 icmp_packet* m_icmp_packet;
00145 
00150                 static const uint32_t m_dataBytes;
00151 };
